titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to remove the authority of the National Capital Planning Commission with respect to property owned by the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
National Capital Planning Commission District of Columbia Home Rule Act
National Capital Planning Commission District of Columbia Home Rule Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
National Capital Planning Commission District of Columbia Home Rule Act
This bill limits the authority of the National Capital Planning Commission with respect to the administering of properties or the selling of lands owned by the District of Columbia.
